Our goal was to create a clean and simple App for dueling: 
 - no long loading screen 
 - efficient input system 
 - dice, coin and timer 
 - history (saved when closing) 
 - undo, redo and reset button 
 - no ads 
 
 You can choose between two views: 
 1) An innovative input system (add/sub blocks blocks) 
 2) A traditional input system with a number pad 


 With 1) you can calculate most damages with fewer clicks than with the traditional system. 
 For example 1900 = 1000+1000-100 is only three clicks instead of four with 1+9+00+"-". 
 You can also resolve effects like Ring of Destruction for both players simultaneously by using two fingers. 
 
 The timer can be shown and hidden by dragging your finger down/up. Dice and coin can be thrown again by tapping them.
